title: Lt General Akhtar Nawaz (Retd) sworn in as FPSC chairman
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 9 (APP): Lt. General Akhtar Nawaz Satti (Retd) on Wednesday took the oath of the office of Chairman of the Federal Public Service Commission (FPSC) here.
President Asif Ali Zardari administered the oath to the newly appointed chairman at a swearing-in ceremony held at the Aiwan-e-Sadr.
Notables including senior government officials attended the ceremony.
